tig058.handin01.clubstore

Class TextClubStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • tig058.handin01.clubstore.TextClubStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClubStore

    public class TextClubStore
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClubStore
    A ClubStore which implements the ClubStore interface. This class uses Java's serialization API to store and read the data used.

      • supports

        public boolean supports(java.lang.String s)
        Returnes true if this backend supports the requested backend. So if the supplied String equals "bin" this method returns true, otherwise false.
        Specified by:
        supports in interface ClubStore
        Parameters:
        String - the requested backend
        Returns:
        true if the String is "bin", otherwise false

      • getInstance

        public static ClubStore getInstance()
        In order to prevent multiple instances of this class it can not be instantiated using constructors. Instead you have to get a reference to the single instance of the class using this method.
        Returns:
        ClubStore - the single instance

        public java.util.ArrayList<Member> getMembers()
